name: The Top Player From The Demon Clan
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeUnknown
content: The top player, Pang Yue, called “Daoist of Many Treasures” crosses over from the hottest virtual game “Daoist Heaven” in 2035 to the demon clan in the cultivation world. In this cruel and unforgiving world, Pang Yue uses the nine divine weapons he built in his previous life to achieve the immortal cultivation path!
